content:
Sure, here are some reliable sources where you can find the latest information on Miami Metrorail's fares and promotions:

1. The official website of Miami-Dade Transit - https://www.miamidade.gov/transit/
2. Miami-Dade Transit's mobile app - Go Miami-Dade Transit
3. Transit app - a third-party app that provides real-time transit information, schedules, and fares for Miami Metrorail and other transit systems
4. Local news outlets such as Miami Herald, NBC6, and CBS Miami, which often provide updates on transit fares and promotions. I hope this helps you find the information you need.
